"Oh, hello there. You really are serious: "To reward your diligence, I'll give you a piece of information."
"There's a secret research division in ARKS. The contents of what they research are also top secret."
"That very division created a very large incident."
"As for what they were researching, it seems they acquired data on bestowing photon aptitude on something."
"As for how or what I do not know, but it seems to be a big deal."
"As for what the details are, they don't report on that kind of thing, so you're going to have to look into it."
"It's that kind of organization, you need to look into and not expect any hand outs."
"That is, not just looking but also not realizing things that are close by."
"Why am I telling you all of this?"
"Because you're serious about what you do, so it's amusing to see your reaction."
